DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Leaves
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"My Department","WidgetType":"scheduler","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":27,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select v.UserId,
        v.[Name] as [text],
        DateAdd(hh, 9, cast(v.[Date] as DateTime)) as startDate,
        DateAdd(hh, 18, cast(v.[Date] as DateTime)) as endDate,
        v.[Days]
        from SkillUserVacation v
    where UserIsActive = 1 and
        SentForApprovalAt is not null and
        v.responsibleId = @CurrentUserId
        /*[DateFilter]*/ and v.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate/*[/DateFilter]*/
union
    Select v.UserId,
        v.[Name] as [text],
        DateAdd(hh, 9, cast(v.[Date] as DateTime)) as startDate,
        DateAdd(hh, 18, cast(v.[Date] as DateTime)) as endDate,
        v.[Days]
    from SkillUserVacation v, [User] u, [User] oth
    where  
v.SentForApprovalAt is not null and
        v.UserIsActive = 1 and
        v.UserId = u.Oid and
        oth.Oid = @CurrentUserId and
        oth.Department = u.Department
        /*[DateFilter]*/ and v.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate"]}}]
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Configuration:
{ "appointmentTemplate": "function(data, index, element) { if (element != null && element != undefined && element[0] != null && element[0].style != null) { element[0].style.backgroundColor = \"white\"; element[0].style.color = \"grey\"; } if (data.items != null) { var appointmentHTML = \"\"; data.items.forEach(function (val, dataIndex) { var noImageId = \"noImage\" + val.UserId + \"_\" + val.startDate; var modIndex = dataIndex % 10; var marginCSS = \"\"; if(modIndex !== 0) { marginCSS = \"margin-left:-15px\";} appointmentHTML += \"
\" + val.text.substr(0, 1).toUpperCase() + \"
\"; }); return appointmentHTML; } }" }
